description: This file defines UI components for a notes application front-end, including a NoteList component and a nested NoteListItem component, utilizing LightningJS framework for rendering and interaction handling.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: A component representing a single note item in the list, including display of title, update time, and delete button with interaction handling.

classes.name: NoteList
classes.description: A component managing the list of notes, including rendering items, handling focus navigation, and creating new notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the list of notes from the data provider and updates the list display.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Assigns a click handler to the 'New Note' button to trigger note creation.

methods.name: onFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to the Create button if the list is empty upon focus.

methods.name: onUp
methods.description: Moves focus upward in the note list.

methods.name: onDown
methods.description: Moves focus downward in the note list.

methods.name: _moveFocus
methods.description: Internal method to change focus within note list items based on a direction.
